formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: There are calls to foreign functions that could be dangerous and result in a segmentation fault or the like. We should defensively program against these to make sure that we signal an appropriate error instead of getting the segmentation fault.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: This occurs almost entirely in the GenLLVM pass and can be done most of the time by a check against a null pointer.
